term.title: ladder macromolecule

item.text: A double-strand macromolecule consisting of an uninterrupted sequence of rings, with adjacent rings having two or more atoms in common. Alternatively, a ladder macromolecule is a double-strand macromolecule with constitutional units joined to each other through four atoms, two on one side and two on the other side of each constitutional unit.
